Entrants join an event\'s waiting list during the registration period. Once it closes, the system randomly selects participants from the pool and notifies them through the app. If selected entrants decline, new ones are drawn until all spots are filled.
Geolocation ensures entrants match event regions. Certain events require geolocation to join the waiting list.
Location data is used only to confirm eligibility for events and is not shared with other users.
